LanguageData.Apparello_Standissue.label: Standard issue overalls
LanguageData.Apparello_Standissue.description: Standard military issue air force overalls. Very common amongst orbital drop squads.
LanguageData.Apparello_XcomOne.label: Air Force Overalls
LanguageData.Apparello_XcomOne.description: Standard military issue air force overalls. Very common amongst orbital drop squads.
LanguageData.Apparello_XcomOneCraft.label: X-Com Overalls
LanguageData.Apparello_XcomOneCraft.description: Spaceship engineers all across the galaxy are known to wear these for the resistance they provide; against their worst enemy...electric cables.
LanguageData.Apparello_GSkin.label: Jumpsuit
LanguageData.Apparello_GSkin.description: A basic heat absorbing jumpsuit. Normally seen worn on Glitterworld light infantry, officials and firefighters.
LanguageData.Apparello_GSkinSpacer.label: Cryptopod Bodysuit
LanguageData.Apparello_GSkinSpacer.description: This is the kind of full body suit that you see worn on occasion by long distance travelers.
LanguageData.Carbon_overalls.label: Carbon Overalls
LanguageData.Carbon_overalls.description: High tech overalls with carbon fibers woven in. Provides good protection.
